segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the other side of the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a boy, quite young, climbing on a stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching up into an open cabinet where I can clearly see a cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh, he's definitely trying to grab some cookies!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a sneaky little rascal he is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is right there with him, eagerly anticipating her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but smile at their mischievous teamwork.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are being incredibly quiet about their forbidden snack.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that stool looks so unstable; it's practically tipping over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm amazed at how focused they are on their goal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They certainly don't want to get caught by the woman at the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bit annoying how brazen they are being.
segments.speaker: PAR
